revised_title: J.B.S. Haldane: A Pioneering Geneticist and Biologist
tldr: This biographical memoir of John Burdon Sanderson Haldane highlights his significant contributions to genetics, biochemistry, and physiology. Haldane's work on human physiology, genetics, and biometry made him a prominent figure in the scientific community. His political beliefs and involvement in various institutions also shaped his career and influenced his research.
